channel.title: [Updated] DarkThrone Recruiter - Perfectly Undectectable!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=15pt][DarkThrone] Recruiter - Perfectly Undetectable[/size][/b][/center] There is a button on the recruit page that will give you citizens when you click on it. This script will recruit citizens for you and will click on a random spot on the bitmap every time. The bitmaps are now very small and use a tolerance of 10 in case Dark Throne ever changes the colors ever so slightly. This script also uses random mouse movements and other anti ban features. I have never heard of anyone getting banned for macroing on this game, but I made the script undetectable any way. Enjoy the script! :) For those of you who play [url=http://www.darkthrone.com]DarkThrone[/url]. Here is a script designed to recruit people for you. [b]Just follow the directions in the script exactly![/b] If you ever receive this error:
Error Due to players using automated programs which hurt our site, refreshing has been disabled. Please use the recruit! button on the recruiter. Click here to continue.
Don't worry about it. It's nothing. Even the people who play legit get that message all the time. Don't let that discourage you from using scripts. :) The people who helped with this script. Thank you! - Bullzeye - timetag1190 - Zach1188 105 people downloaded this file before adding the current version. ~Ron PS: Last updated for SCAR Divi 3.06. PS: Updated for 3.20d. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6473.msg2821884.html#msg2821884

item.title: [Updated] DarkThrone Recruiter - Perfectly Undectectable!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

This works fine on scar 3.20d as of June 2009.

program DTRecruiterByRon;

var
  dtmRecruit,
  x, y, x2, y2,
  i : integer;

procedure Load;
begin
  dtmRecruit := DTMFromString('78DA63FCC4C8C0D00FC448C0CC510C4CC3441' +
              '98F0159ADA86AF64EF2465523CFC4C0300355CDE62E174C3568E6' +
              '1C98ED8169179A396BDB9C50D4000078C30C5C');
end;

procedure Free;
begin
  FreeDTM( dtmRecruit );
end;

begin
  ClearDebug;
  GetClientDimensions( x2, y2 );
  if not( FindWindowTitlePart( 'Dark Throne Recruit', False ) ) then
  begin
    WriteLn( 'Cannot find Dark Throne Recruit window.' );
    TerminateScript;
  end else
    ActivateClient;
  Load;
  i := 0;
  while not( IsFKeyDown( 12 ) ) do
  begin
    if ( FindDTM( dtmRecruit, x, y, 0, 0, x2, y2 ) ) then
    begin
      x := x + StrToInt(FloatToStr(Pow(-1, Random(2)))) * Random( 40 );
      y := y + StrToInt(FloatToStr(Pow(-1, Random(2)))) * Random( 10 );
      MoveMouseSmooth( x, y );
      HoldMouse( x, y, True );
      Wait( 10 + Random( 20 ) );
      ReleaseMouse( x, y, True );
      inc( i );
      WriteLn('Recruited ' + IntToStr( i ) + ' citizen(s).');
    end;
    Wait( 1000 + Random( 2000 ) );
  end;
  Free;
end.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: [Updated] DarkThrone Recruiter - Perfectly Undectectable!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Idk man, it still works for me on Vista without changing the bitmap. The whole program is basically…

Contains the bitmap
Searches for the bitmap
If it doesn’t find it, it searches like 10 more times, if it still doesn’t find it, it will kill the program
If it finds it, it will click on it and loop until it doesn’t find it any more.

A very very very very basic script which is very easy to duplicate. If anyone decides to, feel free. I’m no longer updating this script any how.

Read full topic

ken, just click on all the START RECRUITING buttons and then open the script. Change the wait on line 171 and 179 to Wait(0); or Wait(50);

Whichever works better. That should click on each lit up button.
